name: Minimalist for Gmail-like
description:
I like Minimalist for Gmail (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/oddhbkghjoccbljmagcgoklbfdjeiinb) but had enough problems with it that I just implemented the parts I liked in Stylish.

See also style 48340.
